title: Constructing vector-valued automorphic forms on unitary groups
authors:
Thomas L. Browning, Pavel \v{C}oupek, Ellen Eischen, Claire Frechette,
  Serin Hong, Si Ying Lee, David Marcil
abstract:
We introduce a method for producing vector-valued automorphic forms on
unitary groups from scalar-valued ones. As an application, we construct an
explicit example. Our strategy employs certain differential operators. It is
inspired by work of Cl\'ery and van der Geer in the setting of Siegel modular
forms, but it also requires overcoming challenges that do not arise in the
Siegel setting.
